simd_packed_half32 Type Aliassimd_packed_half32typealias simd_packed_half32 = SIMD32<Float16>DiscussionA vector of thirty-two 16-bit floating-point numbers with relaxed alignment.

# simd_packed_half32 | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ simd ](/documentation/simd)

Type Alias# simd_packed_half32



```
typealias simd_packed_half32 = SIMD32<Float16>
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/simd/simd_packed_half32#discussion)

A vector of thirty-two 16-bit floating-point numbers with relaxed alignment.

This type is not available in Metal. The alignment of this type is only that of the underlying scalar element type, so you can use it to load or store from an array of that type.
